activities: CEVA Freight LLC receives and uses personal information from its European Union countries essential to carry out human resources functions and financial management of CEVA Freight LLC.  Personal information is collected and used by CEVA Freight LLC to (i) assist with providing workers with entitlements such as wages and health care benefits; (ii) comply with legal requirements, obligations, and rights, such as income tax deductions; (iii) improve and maintain effective personnel administration; (iv) report and carry out workforce analysis; (v) manage work activities and personnel; (vi) monitor compliance with applicable legislation; and (vii) facilitate communication with workers at their place of work through use of their workplace address, workplace telephone number and email address.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Cooperation with the EU Data Protection Authorities:  All EEA jurisdictions have established DPAS overseeing the processing of personal information that are willing to assist in the resolution of complaints.  As part of its Safe Harbor commitment, CEVA Freight LLC has agreed to cooperate with these DPAS to resolve any complaints.
